game.name: Checkmate MAGIC
game.shortDescription: Move freely as enemies react to every step and a global heartbeat. Strike in chess patterns, snap-cast cards for timed buffs, fuse Frostfire/Hellfire, dodge board modifiers, crush elites and bosses, chase endless waves.
